title: [Medicine] COVID-19 virus infects human pancreatic β-cells and elicits β-cell impairment, affecting insulin, with apoptotic β-cell signaling, similar to that observed in Type 1 diabetes. The new study shows SARS-CoV-2 can directly induce β-cell killing. (Cell Metabolism, 18 May 2021)

[Epidemiology] Researchers find evidence that countries which impose the strictest form of lockdowns (national and local) will result in a reduction in growth of new confirmed cases of coronavirus. Furthermore, they show countries in Europe are more likely to impose a national lockdown than any other continent.
